title: The Integration - 12 Days of Claudemas
style: Epic Cinematic Rock, triumphant and powerful, 130 BPM, orchestral strings with rock guitar
lyrics:
[Intro - Building]
Bringing it all together

[Verse 1]
Day nine, connection, FliHub interop
APIs talking, data never stops
Day ten, automation, N8N workflows run
Orchestration magic, many tasks as one

[Verse 2]
Day eleven, storytelling, narratives unite
Images and voices, videos in flight
Day twelve, completion, everything's just right
Twelve tools together, shining in the light

[Chorus - Epic]
Journey's done, twelve tools complete
Claudemas magic, can't be beat
From harness to story, we built it all
Twelve days of Claudemas, hear the call!

[Bridge - Instrumental build]

[Final Chorus - Full power]
Built it with Claude, day by day
Twelve tools born, along the way
From code to creation, watched it grow
Twelve days of Claudemas, now you know!

[Outro - Triumphant]
Twelve days, one journey, mission complete
prompt: A triumphant epic cinematic rock anthem with soaring orchestral strings, powerful guitar riffs, and victorious energy
description: Epic Cinematic Rock finale bringing together all the tools built during the 12 Days of Claudemas. Triumphant and powerful, celebrating the completion of the journey with orchestral elements and rock energy.
